class_notes:
(Same as THEA 375RW 1)
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)
Advanced Playwriting


Application required. Complete course atlas information (including texts and grading) and application form will be available on the Creative Writing Program website: https://creativewriting.emory.edu/index.html


Students will generate, workshop, and revise a full-length play.
course_description: Spring semester. Admittance by assessment of readiness for advanced work by intermediate level instructor in genre. Intensive workshop in the writing of playwriting for advanced students. May be repeated for a maximum of eight hours credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 4012, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 2:30-5:30p, Instructor: K. Belflower, Status: Open
